title: Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views, Sun deck, Dog wash
posting_body: ['Welcome home to The Eddy', 'The Eddy is located along the waterfront in East Boston, boasting unrivaled views of the Boston skyline and within walking distance to an eclectic mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment.', "The Eddy is transit-oriented and serves as a bridge between Boston's most vibrant neighborhoods.", 'Pricing and availability subject to change.', 'Call Now:', '(617) 380-4884 x 5', 'OR Text', '5', 'to', '(617) 380-4884', 'to contact our team.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 673.0 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Low-flow fixtures', '- High-efficiency LED lighting', '- Nest Learning Thermostats™', '- Locally-sourced and recycled-content materials', '- Well-designed living spaces', '- Energy Star-rated appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Music room', '- Grilling stations', '- Access to a new waterfront park', '- Modern fitness facilities', '- Access to boat landing', '- Fireplace', "- Lounge with a chef's kitchen", '- Direct access to Lo Presti Park', '- Sun deck', '- Bike maintenance facilities', '- Dog wash', '- Secure bike parking', '- Well-served by transit through the blue line, an expanded water taxi station, highways and Logan Airport', '- Pet-friendly', '- Waterfront property with uninterrupted views of the Boston Harbor and city skyline', '- Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views', '- Outdoor terrace', '- Car sharing options', '- On-site restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining spaces', '- Poolside restaurant service for residents', '- Private conference rooms', '- Pool', 'The Eddy', '10 New Street , East Boston, MA, 02128', '2uLWx5OG8G']
